original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 315.50/317.00 to the US dollar in mid-day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee was quoted at 315.50/317.00 to the US dollar in mid-day trade Thursday, marginally weaker from yesterday’s close of 314.50/315.00 to the US dollar, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted at 13.20/40 percent down from closing at 13.60/60 percent on Wednesday.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 was quoted at 13.50/80 percent stable from closing at 13.50/70 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 14.20/30 percent down from closing at 14.25/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 14.50/55 percent stable from closing at 14.50/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted at 15.85/90 percent up from closing at 15.10/20 percent. (Colombo/Aug03/2023)
